# WKWebExtensionContext.NotificationUserInfoKey

**Structure**

Constants for specifying web extension context information in notifications.

## Declaration

```swift
struct NotificationUserInfoKey
```

## Type properties

- **matchPatterns**: The corresponding value represents the affected permission match patterns in [doc://com.apple.webkit/documentation/WebKit/WKWebExtensionContext] notifications.
- **permissions**: The corresponding value represents the affected permissions in [doc://com.apple.webkit/documentation/WebKit/WKWebExtensionContext] notifications.

## Initializers

- **init(_:)**: Creates a constant from a value you provide.
- **init(rawValue:)**: Creates a constant from a raw value you provide.

## Structures

- **WKWebExtensionContext.Error**: Constants used to indicate errors in the web extension context domain.

## Conforms To

- Equatable
- Hashable
- RawRepresentable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
